sentence: Seth takes a closer look at Congressman Jim Jordan refusing to cooperate with the January 6 investigation and Sen. Ted Cruz debasing himself on Fox News.

sentence: pic.twitter.com/8AWWLhMxNy — Scott Morefield (@SKMorefield) January 12, 2022 RELATED: GOP Senator Slams ‘Least Trusted Bureaucrat’ After Fauci Is Caught On Hot Mic Calling Him A ‘Moron’ Carlson Excoriates ‘Filthy Little Demagogue’ Fauci Carlson said at the beginning of his monologue, “Turns out, Tony Fauci’s even more loathsome and complicit even than his toughest critics ever alleged.” “Today, two Republican congressmen, James Comer and Jim Jordan, released emails that show Fauci was warned by scientists at the very beginning of the Corona pandemic this virus very likely leaked from the Wuhan Institute of Virology,” Carlson said.
author: John Hanson
title: Tucker Carlson Goes All In: Blasts Fauci As ‘Filthy Little Demagogue’

sentence: For the 2022 midterms, nearly 100 Republican lawmakers have accepted donations from the Koch Industries PAC, including Reps. Liz Cheney (R-WY), Jeff Duncan (R-SC), Don Bacon (R-NE), Tony Gonzalez (R-TX), Adam Kinzinger (R-IL), Ashley Hinson (R-IA), Julia Letlow (R-LA), Jackie Walorski (R-IN), Garret Graves (R-LA), Jim Banks (R-IN), Byron Donalds (R-FL), Yvette Herrell (R-NM), and Jim Jordan (R-OH), among others.
author: John Binder
title: Axios: Breitbart News Readers, Trump’s Small-Dollar Donors Steer ‘Modern’ GOP as Corporate Class Fades

sentence: In a stronger period of time in our country, this crime would have been punishable by death.” In an even briefer statement three days later, evidently still basking in the glow of apparent triumph, he proclaimed: “I was proven right about the spying, and I will be proven right about 2020.” The same development was likewise hailed loudly by Tucker Carlson on Fox News and on social media by loyalists including Donald Trump Jr, Ronna McDaniel, Ted Cruz, Kevin McCarthy, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Mark Meadows and Jim Jordan but what exactly has Mr Durham alleged?

sentence: But only a few days later, during a segment with Rep. Jim Jordan, Tucker voiced the same sentiment more clearly: “I think we should probably take the side of Russia,” he said, “if we have to choose between Russia and Ukraine.” Despite saying that he was "just kidding" about rooting for Russia over Ukraine, Tucker just doubled down on supporting the Russians in the conflict.
author: Tim Dickinson
title: These Are the American Right-Wingers Covering for Putin as Russia Invades Ukraine

sentence: Breaking: Following @FDRLST reporting that Adam Schiff and his staff doctored a text message between Jim Jordan and former WH chief of staff Mark Meadows, the House Jan. 6 committee has just admitted that it did, in fact, doctor the text message.https://t.co/78aRNyOib7 — Mollie (@MZHemingway) December 15, 2021 It seems there isn’t much that Kinzinger isn’t willing to believe if it casts a negative pall on his political adversaries.
author: Rusty Weiss
title: Never Trumper Adam Kinzinger Falls For Fake Tucker Carlson Quote Shared By Fellow ‘Never Trumper’ Joe Walsh

sentence: Troy Nehls, a Texas Republican, simply wrote, “Make Twitter Great Again,” while Rep. Jim Jordan praised Musk on Fox, painting him as the embodiment of “free speech.” Last Saturday, Musk rejected an offer from Twitter to join the company’s board—a move that would have barred him from acquiring a Twitter stake greater than 14.9%.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Right-Wingers Are Absolutely Eating Up the Idea of Elon Musk Taking Over Twitter
